message: It sounds like it would make an ideal version 2.0.  I really hope to see it one day.
There's a massively rewritten fork out there that sounds far more capable than what I've done.
Any suggestions on how to collaborate on Term::ShellUI?  Maybe google groups?
Might get to that in the next month.
Can't offer details since it's not released yet but I hope the author will post about it here.
I plan on fixing issue #2, cleaning up the examples, and releasing a 1.0.
Hm, convore is more like IRC than a mailing list, can't say I'm very happy with this either.  :(
I'm curious about the rewritten fork and what it offers
jordan2175: is your fork backwards compatible or quite a departure?

Not sure if convore or someone else deleted the other discussion, here it is in google cache: http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:tV57k6oyxKcJ:https://convore.com/termshellui/termshellui-fork-and-rewrite/564983/+shellui+cisco+cli&cd=1&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=us&source=www.google.com
see you on sourceforge or github.  so long!
The original is still at https://github.com/bronson/Term-ShellUI
